name: AI Deep Dive — NVDA — 2026-02-14
rationale: NVIDIA remains the dominant player in AI acceleration with a wide competitive moat. While growth is naturally decelerating from hyper-growth levels, the Data Center segment continues to expand. Base case assumes sustained leadership but aggressive competition entering from AMD and custom silicon (CSPs).

bear.rationale: Competition from CSP in-house silicon (AWS Trainium, Google TPU) erodes market share faster than expected. Margins compress as software stack (CUDA) moat weakens.

base.rationale: Strong execution continues. Sovereign AI demand buffers enterprise lumpiness. Margins remain best-in-class but normalize slightly as H200/Blackwell volume ramps.

bull.rationale: AI demand is in early innings. Inference market explodes, and NVIDIA captures 85%+ share. Software revenue (NVIDIA NIMs) becomes a material high-margin recurring stream.

aiThesis.rationale: ### Investment Thesis\n\nNVIDIA is a generational company... (Markdown content)
